sect1.title: Differences Between the xm and xl Applications
sect1.para: The purpose of this chapter is to list all differences between xm and xl applications. Generally, xl is designed to be compatible with xm. Replacing xm with xl in custom scripts or tools is usually sufficient.
You can also use the &libvirt; framework using the virsh command. In this documentation only the first OPTION for virsh will be shown. To get more help on this option do a:
